snippet: Voters supporting Donald J. Trump in the Super Tuesday contests expressed a support that could sustain him as a front-runner.
abstract: Interviews with Super Tuesday voters supporting Donald J Trump show startling depth and diversity of support that could keep him as front-runner; all  who are interviewed profess anxiety about state of nation and anger at establishment.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Christina Capecchi, Nicholas Fandos, Alan Blinder, Katherine Q. Seelye and Jess Bidgood.

lead_paragraph: Voters supporting Donald J. Trump in the Super Tuesday contests expressed a support that could sustain him as a front-runner.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Backers Express Deep and Diverse Support
headline.print_headline: Trump Backers Voice Deep and Diverse Support
